H0.text: In which decade was Piltdown man allegedly discovered in Sussex. 1920s

H1.text: In which decade was Piltdown man allegedly discovered in Sussex. 1900s

H2.text: In which decade was Piltdown man allegedly discovered in Sussex. 1890s

H3.text: In which decade was Piltdown man allegedly discovered in Sussex. 1910s

A4.text: In February 1912, Dawson contacted Arthur Smith Woodward, stating he had found a section of a human-like skull in Pleistocene gravel beds near Piltdown, East Sussex.

A5.text: In 1912, Dawson claimed that he had discovered the 'missing link' between early apes and humans.
